item.title: Mitigate blocking the main thread
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We all know that for web applications, perceived performance is highly importance for our users. For data intensive SPAs with CPU-intensive tasks, the single-threaded nature of Javascript starts to hinder the application’s perceived performance when you cannot fit those CPU-intensive tasks into a 16.
